overall_score.description: A holistic score representing resume quality.

suggestions.description: List of specific edit suggestions with precise character offsets.

start_char.description: Start character offset (0-indexed) in the input resume text.

end_char.description: End character offset (0-indexed, inclusive) in the input resume text.

line_number.description: Line number (1-indexed) where the text occurs.

original_text.description: Exact substring from the input resume that is being improved.

suggested_text.description: Model's improved text to replace the original substring.

category.description: Type of issue addressed: grammar, clarity, impact, quantification, formatting, or length.

high_level_rewrite.description: A full resume rewritten with all suggestions applied.
